divs: sighting detailsi was driving west on the way home at 9:43 pm when i sighted (7) reddish\yellow lights in the air. they were somewhat in formation yet quite apart from each other. they headed north west. i stopped my car leaned out the window for a sound but heard none. i thought they were baloons or helicopters at first. they were at varying heights and spread out maybe 1\4 mile all moving at the same slow speed. i seemed to be able to keep up with them and stopped twice along their flight path. has any one else seen these lights? maybe someone at a party lit those paper bag baloons and sent them aloft. they one by one disapeared over the trees and into the evening haze until i couldnt see them any more as i watched from the entrance to my sub. the more i think about it it was probably bags with candles lit inside for light and for lift. anyway it was exciting at the time.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Canton
There was one other sighting in Canton on or around May 4th 2013
Summary: 7 lights traveling slowly nw at different heights.
